mapper.select: SELECT ID_MEMBER , NVL(CNT_STAMP_STACK, 0) AS CNT_STAMP_STACK FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD WHERE YN_STMAP_LAST = 'Y' AND DT_REG >= TO_DATE (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND DT_REG <= TO_DATE (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SELECT ID_MEMBER , CD_GRADE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER WHERE ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER}

SELECT CASE WHEN CD_GRADE = '03' AND ('01' = #{CD_GRADE} OR '02' = #{CD_GRADE}) THEN 'Y' WHEN CD_GRADE = '02' AND '01' = #{CD_GRADE} THEN 'Y' WHEN CD_GRADE = '01' THEN 'N' ELSE 'N' END TP_CHNG , CD_GRADE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_GRADE WHERE FG_USE = 'Y' AND CNT_MIN_STAMP <= TO_NUMBER(#{CNT_STAMP_STACK}) AND CNT_MAX_STAMP >= TO_NUMBER(#{CNT_STAMP_STACK})
SELECT CD_DOWN_STAD FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_DOWN_STAND WHERE FG_USE = 'Y'

SELECT ID_MEMBER , NM_MEMBER , CASE WHEN CD_GRADE = '01' THEN '01' WHEN CD_GRADE = '02' THEN '01' WHEN CD_GRADE = '03' THEN '02' ELSE '01' END CD_GRADE_CHNG FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER TM WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(DT_CHNG_GRADE, TO_NUMBER(#{CD_DOWN_STAD})), 'YYYYMMDD')
